Svein:

Each spirit can grow up to 10 levels.
Also , it is possible to evolve spirits that have completed growth.
When spirits evolve, they increase strenght and return to Level 1, allowing them to grow them to Level 10 again.
Don't forget that you need an Evolutionary Stone to evovle Spirits..
(To evolve Spirits must reach Level 10 at 100% so they requiere the ingredients for evolution from the Evolutonary Stone.)
